definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: turn (NH id.; Syr. pno0, Targum [[פְּנׇא]]; Eth. fanawa:: Ar. faniya pass away, banish; cf. Sab. [[פנה]] (variously) e.g. CIS:iv. Nos. 1, 37, 40; As.pânu, face, Ph. [[פנם]], MI:13, 18 [[לפני]], sf. [[מפני]] l:19);—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: turn toward, [[אֶל]] pers., lit., Ju Jdg 6:14, Is 13:14 = Je 50:16, Job 21:5 (i.e. attentively); cf. of branches Ez Eze 17:6 (in allegory); c. [[עַל]] of direction Ge 24:49; fig. c. ´[[אֶל־י]] (in worship), Is 45:22, other gods Ho 3:1, De 31:18, De 31:20, Le 19:4; for help Le 19:31, Le 20:6, Job 5:1; [[אֶל־אָוֶן]] Job 36:21; c. acc. [[הַמָּקוֹם]] [[אֲשֶׁר יִפְנֶה]] Ez Eze 10:11; c. [[ה]] loc.1Ki 17:3, De 2:3 (+ [[לָכֶם]] dat. eth.), Ct So 6:1; c. [[דֶּרֶח]] 1Sa 13:18, 1Sa 13:18, Job 24:18, ´[[אֶל־ד]] Ju Jdg 20:42, 1Sa 13:17; fig. [[לְדֶרֶח]] Is 53:6, Is 56:11; c. acc. [[כּׂל אֲשֶׁר־יִפְנֶה]] 1Sa 14:47, so, + [[שָׁם]], fig. 1Ki 2:3, i.e. whatever thou undertakest, [[אֶל־כָּל־אֲשֶׁר יִפְנֶה]] Pr 17:8. †

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: turn from, [[מִן]] loc. Ge 18:22, fig., of heart, c. ´[[מֵעִם י]] De 29:17, abs. = turn away De 30:17; in phr. [[עׂרֶף]] ´[[פ]] turn (with) the back (cf. [[ראה עׂרֶף]]) Je 18:17), + [[לִפְנֵי]], Jos 7:12 (of flight), fig., + ´[[אֶל־י]], Je 2:27, Je 32:33.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: turn and do a thing, lit. (esp. + vb. of motion) Nu 21:33, De 1:7, De 1:24, Ju Jdg 18:21, 1Ki 10:13 + 17 t.; to do a thing (inf.) † Ec 2:12. †

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: turn, decline, of day Je 6:4, days of life Ps 90:9. †

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: turn toward, approach, of evening, [[לִפְנוֹת עָָרֶב]] Ge 24:63, De 23:l2; of morning, [[בּׂקֶר]]([[הַ]]) ´[[לִפ]] Ex 14:27, Ju Jdg 19:26, Ps 46:6 (fig.). †

definitions.title: 2. a.
definitions.body: turn and look, look, lit., [[אֶל]] pers. Nu 12:10, 2Ch 20:24, 2Ch 26:20, [[וַיִּפֶן בּׂה וׇכׂה]] Ex 2:l2; c. [[לְמָָעְלָה]] Is 8:21 abs. look (back) 2Ch 13:14; c. [[אַתֲרִי]] look behind one (and see, or say), Jos 8:20, Ju Jdg 20:40, 2Sa 1:7, 2Sa 2:20, 2Ki 2:24, look after anotber Ez Eze 29:16 (fig. for seek alliance with); c. [[אֶל]] of direction Ex 16:10, Nu 17:7.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of inanimate things, face, c. [[אֶל]] loc. Jos 15:7, usu. of facing points of compass, c. [[ה]] loc. 1Ki 7:25, 1Ki 7:25, 1Ki 7:25, 1Ki 7:25 = 2Ch 4:4, 2Ch 4:4, 2Ch 4:4, 2Ch 4:4, Jos 15:2, Ez Eze 8:3, Eze 46:19, but also c. [[קָדִים]] Eze 43:17, Eze 44:1, Eze 46:1, Eze 46:12, Eze 47:2, cf. Eze 43:1.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: fig. look at ([[ב]] rei) = consider Ec 2:11.—2Ch 25:23 v. [[פַּנׇּה]] †

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[פִּנׇּה]] Zep 3:15, etc.; Imv. mpl. [[פַּנּוּ]] Is 40:3 + 2 t.;—turn away, put out of the way, c. acc. pers. Zep 3:15 (‖[[הֵסִיר]]); hence make clear, c. acc. [[הַבַּיִת]], i.e. clear away things scattered about, make orderly, Germ. ‘ aufräumen ’ Ge 24:31; empty it Le 14:36; fig., c. acc. [[דֶּרֶח]] make clear,  free from obstacles, Is 40:3, Is 57:14, Is 62:10, Mal 3:1; acc. om. clear away (ground) before it, i.e. to plant it Ps 80:10 (fig.). †

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: (esp. Je) Pf. 3 ms. [[הִפְנׇה]] Je 48:39, 3 fs. [[הִפְנְתָה]] Je 49:24, etc.; Impf. [[וַיֶּ֫פֶן]] Ju Jdg 15:4; Inf. cstr. sf. [[הַפְנׁתוֹ]] 1Sa 10:9; Pt. [[מַפְנֶה]] Na 2:9; —
turn, c. acc. [[וַיֶּפֶן זׇנׇב אֶל־זׇנׇב]] Ju Jdg 15:4, [[עׂרֶף]] Je 48:39 (cf. [[הפך]] Jos 7:8), [[שִׁכְמוֹ לָלֶכֶת]] 1Sa 10:9.
make a turn, shew (signs of) turning, + [[נׇסוּ]] Je 46:21, [[לָנוּם]] Je 49:24; opp. [[נׇסוּ]] Je 46:5, cf. Na 2:9; + [[אֶל]] pers. Je 47:3. †

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: Imv. mpl. [[הָפְנוּ]] Je 49:8 (Ges:§ 46 a, N.) be ye turned back! (in flight, + [[נֻסוּ]]); Pt. [[מָפְנֶה חָםפ֫וֹנׇה]] Ez Eze 9:2 the gate…which is faced northward (cf.
